# init(group:)

**Initializer**

Creates a section containing the specified group.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(group: NSCollectionLayoutGroup)
```

## Creating a section

- **list(using:layoutEnvironment:)**: Creates a list section with the specified list configuration and layout environment.
- **orthogonalLayoutSectionForMediaItems()**: Creates an orthogonally scrolling section with system default spacing.
